name: Strawberry Butterfly
description:
Help Philo make furriends by collecting noms throughout Heartland, then gifting cheezburgers, chili doggos, and more to the other cats. Solve riddles with the butterflies, hunt butterfly eaters, and even slay butterfly-eater eaters—because, after all, you're the top of the food chain. Meowza!

A cat romance RPG, built in 3 days by a husband-and-wife team for the GDL Valentine's Jam and Valentiny Day 2020.

Default Keyboard Controls

  • Movement—Arrow keys to move up/left/down/right. Hold two arrow keys to move diagonally.
  • Select—Enter or left-click.
  • Cancel—Escape or right-click.

Touchscreen Controls

Strawberry Butterfly supports touchscreen devices. Single-tap to select and inspect; double-tap to cancel and return. Tap to move Philo. 

Mouse Controls

Strawberry Butterfly supports play via mouse. Left-click to select and inspect; right-click to cancel and return. Click to move Philo.

Tips

  • Go fishing for noms worth double-hearts!
  • Level up to gain access to the boat, blimp, and ship.
  • Heal by eating strawberries or licking wounds.
  • Unlock up to two dozen achievements.
